expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Dashboard mode based on 'dashboard' keyword
Agent checks for active progress session at /tmp/skill-progress-*.json
If active session: injects progress JSON for process monitor view
If no active session: runs audit.py --all for audit overview
Agent copies templates/dashboard.html and injects appropriate JSON
Dashboard auto-detects view from data shape (phases vs skills array)
Agent renders via Playwright or browser open
